document_data.mainbody:
The Mosque of Kossuth was a temple located in the City of Brass in 1367 DR.
This mosque was found in the Furnace ward of the city.
This mosque was made from beaten bronze.
Since the efreet had discouraged the worship of Kossuth since the mosques erection, the building had fallen into a state of disrepair. However, the efreet would never dare destroy the mosque for fear of angering the primordial.
